abstract.p: Schedule of pesticide spraying in New York area aimed at killing mosquitoes responsible for spread of West Nile Virus

block.p: STATEN ISLAND 10 p.m. today to 5 a.m. tomorrow and 10 p.m. Wednesday to 5 a.m. Thursday All residential areas 6:30 to 9:30 p.m. today and Wednesday Nonresidential areas (aerial spraying) 5 to 6:30 a.m. tomorrow and Thursday Nonresidential areas (aerial spraying)

STATEN ISLAND 10 p.m. today to 5 a.m. tomorrow and 10 p.m. Wednesday to 5 a.m. Thursday All residential areas 6:30 to 9:30 p.m. today and Wednesday Nonresidential areas (aerial spraying) 5 to 6:30 a.m. tomorrow and Thursday Nonresidential areas (aerial spraying)
THE BRONX 10 p.m today to 5 a.m. tomorrow Riverdale, North Riverdale, Fieldston and Woodlawn
ROCKLAND COUNTY 10 p.m. tomorrow to Monday to 5 a.m. Tuedsay Orangetown 10 p.m. Tuesday to 5 a.m. Wednesday and 10 p.m. Thursday to 5 a.m. Friday Haverstraw
WESTCHESTER COUNTY 11:30 p.m. Wednesday to 4:30 a.m. Thursday Sleepy Hollow, Tarrytown, Mount Pleasant, Pleasantville and Irvington
BERGEN COUNTY, N.J. 3 to 6 a.m. tomorrow Ramsey
MIDDLESEX COUNTY, N.J. 7 to 11 p.m. tomorrow and Wednesday Woodbridge
7 to 11 p.m. Tuesday and Thursday Edison
OTHER NEW JERSEY COUNTIES Limited spraying as needed at unspecified sites in Middlesex, Union and Hudson Counties
FOR MORE INFORMATION: New York City (877) 968-4692
Connecticut (860) 424-4184 Note: Spraying schedules are subject to change in the event of rain. (Source: Health and mosquito control agencies)
